seo: 大华摄像头,未授权访问漏洞,CVE-2021-33044
summary: 该插件用于检测大华摄像头是否存在未授权访问漏洞（CVE-2021-33044），通过发送特定HTTP请求判断目标是否受影响。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether Dahua cameras have unauthorized access vulnerabilities (CVE-2021-33044) by sending specific HTTP requests to determine if the target is affected.
